STORE_ENVIRONMENT_DESCRIPTION = #{storeEnvironmentDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSUMER_LED_CONCEPT_STORE = #{consumerLedConceptStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MPT_STORE = #{mptStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
